column3: drake yeah i appreciate your patience tonight it's been a moment since i've done some public speaking i find nowadays it's you know best to keep quiet but uh sometimes you just gotta let it when i'm not sober i smoke goodie no glaucoma i'm a stockholder private flights back home no stop over still spittin' that shit that they shot pac over the shit my mother look shocked over yeah but with a canvas i'm the group of seven a migraine take two excedrin i'm the one twice over i'm the new eleven and if i die i'ma do it reppin' i never do a second i swear niggas be eyein' me all hard and
